metadata.description: Master response classification rules for badminton shot effectiveness analysis (attacking + defensive)
metadata.author: Adithya / Paradigm

instructions.pressure_level: Options: 'forced' (opponent under pressure), 'neutral' (balanced exchange), 'counter' (opponent gains advantage)
instructions.quality_score: Range: 0.0-1.0 (0=poor shot, 1=excellent shot based on opponent's response)
instructions.tactical_meaning: Brief description of what this exchange means tactically
